args:
The three women meet the dragon Lumière
Pandora at the Memoria Caverns and learn she
summoned Pecorine in order to save the world
from a malevolent force known as Aether. After
hearing her story, they all agree to help.
This mana fount must be what that\nlittle girl was talking about.
I believe so. But who can say if this\nmana fount is truly what she meant by \n＂a place where memories gather＂?
That came from the caverns!\nWas it a fiend?!
I swear on my life, you shall go no further!
The fiend is attacking that girl! \nLet's help her!
Huh?! It changed into a different form!
I don't care what form it takes...\nIt's getting a taste of my Princess Strike!
Okay, now it turned into a black mist\nand disappeared.
Oh, you made it... I'm so relieved!
That voice!\nYou're the one who spoke to me!
Indeed. I am Lumière Pandora,\nthe dragon who called you here.
My twin sister and I have been separately\ntraveling the world and communicating\ntelepathically.

My sister seals wicked things in her 
Box of Calamity, while I carry happiness
in the Box of Hope. Together, we strive
to make the world a better place.
But recently, I lost contact with her.
And when I did, a creature called Aether\nthat should have been sealed away in\nher box appeared on this continent.
Just what is this Aether thing anyway?
A formless monster that came from the\ngap between this world and another.
It usually appears as a black mist,\nbut can take the form of anything it sees.
So the fiend we chased off just now...
Was Aether, yes. Once I learned of the\ncreature's designs, I decided it was best\nto protect this place.
Aether wants the memories of ruin that\nhave come to rest at the mana fount\ndeep within these caverns.
So it can copy them, I assume.\n...Wait, no!
Giant fiends have brought calamity to this\nworld countless times. I fear these fiends\nare what ＂memories of ruin＂ refers to.
Which means Aether is planning to absorb\nthose memories and take their shape!
It will indeed assume the form most \nappropriate to destroy a world.
Which means we have to protect this\nmana fount no matter what!
Okay, but why bring ME here to help out?
The Box of Hope is a magical device that\ndraws in whatever I ask from other worlds.
And when I asked it to bring someone\nwho values the bonds between people,\nit chose you.
My sister said someone like that would\nbe able to defeat Aether completely.
...I had intended to only bring you here\nafter I'd asked you first.
If you prefer not to be involved,\nI can send you back to your world.
But if you are willing to help,\nthen please lend me your aid!
This is our world's problem, Pecorine.\nDo not feel that you need to sacrifice\nyourself in any way over it.
Yeah, if you want to head back home,\nwe'll find a way to deal with this mess.
Aw, you guys are so sweet...
But I've made up my mind!\nC'mere, you little so-and-so! ☆
Um, Pecorine? Why are you\nrubbing my head?
From the first moment you talked to me,\nI could tell you were mega tense.
I mean, you put on a brave face and all,\nbut deep down you're worried as heck.
Well...yes. I've lost all contact with my\nsister, and Aether—who she once sealed\naway—is now running amok...
But while I'm worried about my sister,\nI know I have to be strong for her!

Well, that tears it. My friends back home
would never let me hear the end of it
if I abandoned an earnest little thing like
you in her hour of need!
So until we deal with this Aether thing,\nI'll be right by your side.
There, there. Let it all out.
In that case, we will also remain with you\nuntil the entire affair is dealt with.
Yeah, we can't just turn our backs on a\nworld crisis...or a crying dragon.
Heck yes! With our combined might,\nAether doesn't stand a chance!
